news.title: Emmys 2025: Christopher Lennertz Wins Outstanding Original Music and Lyrics for The Boys
news.summary: Songs from Agatha All Along, Andor, SNL50: The Anniversary Special, and Will & Harper were also recognized in the category

news.title: Emmys 2025: Theodore Shapiro Wins Outstanding Music Composition for Severance
news.summary: Andor, Based on a True Story, Cobra Kai, The Studio, and The White Lotus were also recognized for Outstanding Music Composition for a Series (Original Dramatic Score)
